DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present study was to determine the effects of a multidisciplinary approach and intensity-controlled interval training on cardiovascular risk factors in overweight adolescents
DOC.brief_title: High-intensity Exercise Training or Multidisciplinary Treatment in Extremely Obese Adolescents
DOC.criteria: BMI >+ 2SD (age adjusted) Fitted for group treatment at least one parent attending the treatment Not able to join treatment not able to walk
